thread.title: Obama Administration Near Ban On Trans-Fat: Report
thread.title_full: Obama Administration Near Ban On Trans-Fat: Report

author: Sam Levine
title: Obama Administration Near Ban On Trans-Fat: Report
text:
Obama Administration Near Ban On Trans-Fat: Report Politico Updated: 1 hour ago US President Barack Obama holds an ice cream cone during a surprise stop at Deb's Ice Cream and Deli in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, July 10, 2012. AFP PHOTO / Saul LOEB (Photo credit should read SAUL LOEB/AFP/GettyImages) | SAUL LOEB via Getty Images reddit 
The Obama administration is expected to all but ban trans fat in a final ruling that could drop as soon as next week, killing most uses of an ingredient that has been put in everything from frozen pizza to Reeseâ€™s Pieces but since deemed harmful to human health.
